Join Us

We are always looking for highly motivated, ambitious, and collaborative new lab members with interest and expertise in cell and molecular biology, flow cytometry, and work with mouse genetic models.

Please send your cover letter and CV to Gina Vessecchia (gina.vessecchia@einsteinmed.edu) regarding pre-, post-doctoral, and other research opportunities in the Steidl Laboratory.

Please feel free to contact us for any potential collaborations.
